name: Los Angeles

authority.name: LADOT Parking Violations Bureau
authority.authority_name: Los Angeles Department of Transportation Parking Violations Bureau
authority.serves_description: Most parking citations issued within the City of Los Angeles are processed through the LADOT Parking Violations Bureau.

citation_pattern.notes: Citation number appears on the ticket and online payment portal; may contain up to 11 alphanumeric characters.

submission_methods.notes: Initial reviews may be requested by web, mail, phone or in-person; mailing address requires a letter explaining why the citation should be dismissed.

phone_confirmation.purpose: Confirm this is the correct mailing address for your initial review request or to verify that your citation routes to LADOT.

verification.source_note: Mailing address and instructions confirmed on LADOT PVB correspondence and mail-in payment pages.

official_confirmation_department: Parking Violations Bureau / LA County Parking Enforcement
official_confirmation_purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.
qa_blocking_issues: Need confirmation whether LAPD parking citations always route to LADOT PVB.
Metro Transit Court mailing address and procedures not confirmed via an official source.
qa_known_gaps: UCLA section missing confirmed mailing address for Phase-1 protests.
USC section missing confirmed mailing address for Phase-1 protests.
Citation patterns for LADOT, LA County, Metro and campus authorities are approximate and require verification.
